mapper.insert: insert into smp_sys_dict_language (DICT_ID, DICT_TYPE, LANGUAGE_TYPE, DICT_NAME) values (#{dictId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{languageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into smp_sys_dict_language
DICT_ID,
DICT_TYPE,

DICT_NAME,

select
from smp_sys_dict_language where DICT_NAME regexp 'Interest|interest|Benifit|benifit|Benefit|benefit|Loan|loan'
